channel.title: Demolitionx
channel.description:
[s]Hello Moparscape!
As you may have noticed I took a 2 week break from RSPS due to me being pissed off and backstabbed over and over again. I am back and want to start a development. This will not be a normal development so you may want to stay and read the following.
What I want: I want a newer server preferably 718 or higher maybe even 723 with an active community running on VPS. What I need: Someone able to donate that will take the place as in-game OWNER. Yes, Owner, Not co-owner. What I will be doing: I will be coding and be in-game not often but I will be in-game. I will still have a larger say then you will have.
What do you want to be? Owner? Coder With Me? Moderator? Administrator?
How to apply?
Name: Age: Position applying for: Ability to donate: Past work: Years in experience: Other information:
Some of my work: - First mystery boxes in 667. - First 100% dicing in 667. - First complete jad on 667, all waves. - Owned server called Demolitions for 2 years now. [/s]
[size=18pt]RECONSIDERING [/size]

item.title: Demolitionx
item.dc:creator: @Sanity_Maiden Sanity Maiden
item.description:
@Sanity_Maiden wrote:

Name: Callum Gibson
Age: 16
Position applying for: GFX Designer (If position open) Or Administrator.
Ability to donate: If there is a donate VIA SMS yes, if not, then it will be a few weeks untill i can donate.
Past work: Founded Project-Soul, 2 Years ago. Now there is some crappy leech out and i do not claim rights to that.
Created Logo’s for Devenius Server and others, was kind of a mercenary thing.
Here’s some examples of my work.

FalconScapeFmt.jpg778×266

PROOF I CODED PROJECT SOUL - CHECK UPLOAD DATE

Years in experience: 3
Other information: The images i uploaded above are OLD examples of my work, as i have grown older i now have more experience using photoshop and other programs, i am also loyal and on alot throughout the day.
With Admin rights, i will make sure other players obey the rules and keep the players happy without giving out free items.

Contact - Skype - Simpleservers2012

Hope to hear from you, thanks.

Read full topic
